page.title: 03Oil Pipeline Project
page.content: Five months work for a Â£4O million project to lay a pipeline underground from Fawley S.Hants to Seison near Wolverhampton. Esso had to negotiate with 420 landowners in this scheme. In this area 6 farmers have been affected. The pipeline 14"(35cms) in diameter carries white oil products, petrol, paraffin, jet fuel, and diesel Batches of these are pumped consecutively without break of flow. It is estimated that 500 million gallons annually will be pumped through. Construction working width 60feet wide: soil replaced in right sequence, ie;subsoil, topsoil. Temporary wooden fencing erected until new hedges have grown up to replace those removed. Restrictions on building works and tree growth within 10 feet of buried pipeline remain in force for ever.
